Input: Supply List for First Grade Classes
Welcome to first grade!
These are the supplies you will need for the first day of school.
The following supplies will be "community supplies" so they do not need to be labeled with your
child's name.
2 packages of No. 2 Ticonderoga pencils (sharpened)
12 Elmer's glue sticks (white)
8 black dry erase markers (fine tip only - low odor)
2 large erasers
1 box of tissues
Please label the following items with your child's name:
2 or 3 boxes of Crayola crayons (24 count maximum - NO Twistables)
colored pencils - Crayola Twistables
one yellow highlighter
one pair of children's scissors
clipboard
Art smock (an old over -sized shirt will work just fine)
one 1 inch 3 ring binder (black)
one poly vinyl 2 -pocket folder (red)
one pump bottle of hand sanitizer (small)
one box of sandwich -sized Ziploc baggies (if your last name begins with letters A -L)
one box of gallon -sized Ziploc baggies (if your last name begins with letters M -Z)
one supply box (approximate dimensions that work best are 10.5x6x2.5. -
Please make sure that the depth of the container is no more than 4 inches,
otherwise it will not fit in your child's desk).
*One pair of headphones with a straight (not an L-shaped) jack. Headphones must NOT
be wireless in order to work with our iPads in class. Both Wegmans and Staples seem to
have decent options. Unfortunately, the very inexpensive headphones tend not to last.
*Parents - Please label your child's school bag with his/her name, address, phone number, and
bus number.
